Container.Name: claudecodeui
Container.Overview:
Use Claude Code, Cursor CLI, or Codex on mobile and web with CloudCLI (aka Claude Code UI). A free open-source web UI that helps you manage your Claude Code, Cursor, or Codex sessions and projects remotely from any device.
Features: - Responsive design for desktop, tablet, and mobile - Interactive chat interface with Claude Code/Cursor/Codex - Built-in shell terminal access - File explorer with syntax highlighting - Git integration for version control - Session management and history - Claude CLI pre-installed and bundled
Access the WebUI at: http://[IP]:[PORT:3002]

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the web interface

Config.Name: Claude CLI Data
Config.Description: Claude CLI authentication and session data (persisted)

Config.Name: Projects Directory 1
Config.Description: Mount your project directories for code access. Adjust path as needed.

Config.Name: Projects Directory 2
Config.Description: Optional: Additional project directory. Leave empty if not needed.

Config.Name: Projects Directory 3
Config.Description: Optional: Additional project directory. Leave empty if not needed.

Config.Name: Internal Port
Config.Description: Internal application port (usually no need to change)

Config.Name: Claude CLI Path
Config.Description: Path to Claude CLI executable (pre-installed in container)

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID (default: 99 for 'nobody' user on Unraid)

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID (default: 100 for 'users' group on Unraid)
